translation: Arjuna said, "O Madhusudana, how can I fight in battle with arrows against Bhishma and Drona, who are worthy of being worshipped, O destroyer of enemies?"
commentary: 2.4 How how? Bhishma Bhishma? I'm I? Numbers in battle? Drona Drona? f and? Madhusudana Or Madhusudana? with arrows with arrows? Pratiyotsyami shall fight? Pujarhau worthy to be worshipped? Arisudana O destroyer of enemies.No commentary.
